entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
